maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Move away human, great eldest has forbidden entry to old home because of \c[3]black monsters\c[0].
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Проваливай, человек, великая старейшина запретила входить в старый дом, всё из-за \c[3]чёрных монстров\c[0].

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Look up to see what you humans did.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Посмотри, что вы, люди, сделали.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You brought \c[3]black monsters\c[0] into our land.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Вы принесли \c[3]чёрных монстров\c[0] на нашу землю.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: We had to give up great eldest house to keep fiends here.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Нам пришлось уступить дом великой старейшины, чтобы сдержать этих извергов здесь.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This path, leads to great eldress house.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Этот путь ведёт к дому великой старейшины.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You may pass, since you helped.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Ты можешь пройти, поскольку помогла нам.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: К'тара

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: We're finally here.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Наконец-то мы на месте.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Let's act quickly. If I remember correctly, the spot was somewhere around here.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Давай действовать быстро. Если я правильно помню, это было где-то здесь.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: К'тара

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Eeek! I forgot how suddenly it comes up...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Оооой! Я и забыла, как резко это происходит...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: К'тара

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Back when I was young, me and the other younglings played here and found this.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Когда я была маленькой, мы с другой малышнёй играли здесь и нашли это.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I believe it was an old escape route built by the founders of our village.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я думаю, что это старый путь эвакуации, построенный основателями нашей деревни.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: The important part: We can now get to the Chief's Den.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Самое главное: теперь мы можем добраться до Главного логова.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Up ahead are a lot of Wiccats. And also something which I believe must be their source.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Впереди много Злокошек. А также то, что, я предполагаю, должно быть их источником.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I don't know exactly where the source is, but my bet is in one of the houses.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я не знаю точно, где находится источник, но ставлю на то, что в одном из этих домов.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: The others told me it should be very hard to miss as it looks pretty out of place.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Другие говорили, что его довольно сложно пропустить, так как он выглядит довольно неуместно.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Some kind of \c[3]glowing pole\c[0]... They believe it's an extension from that cursed powerplant.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Что-то вроде \c[3]светящегося столба\c[0]... Они считают, что это часть этой проклятой электростанции.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: My hope is that by getting rid of the source, we can put an end to this infestation.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я надеюсь, избавившись от источника, мы сможем положить конец этому заражению.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Seeker, you must go in and find this source.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Искатель, ты должна пойти и найти этот источник.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'm sure that by doing so, we can calm the Shad and bring an end to the tension.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я уверена, что, предприняв это, мы сможем успокоить шадов и положить конец напряжённости.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'll wait here. Come back to me once you're done.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я буду ждать здесь. Вернись ко мне после того, как закончишь.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Do we have to fight the kittens again...?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Нам снова нужно драться с котятами...?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: It should suffice to get rid of the \c[3]source\c[0]! But we may not be able to avoid fighting some of the Wiccats this time!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Достаточно избавиться от \c[3]источника\c[0]! Но в этот раз, возможно, нам не избежать драки со Злокошками!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This game is cruel...!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Эта игра жестока...!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: К'тара

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Seeker, you must go in and find this source.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Искатель, ты должна пойти и найти этот источник.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'm sure that by doing so, we can calm the Shad and bring an end to the tension.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я уверена, что, предприняв это, мы сможем успокоить шадов и положить конец напряжённости.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: I'll wait here. Come back to me once you're done.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Я буду ждать здесь. Вернись ко мне после того, как закончишь.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: К'тара

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You're back! Did you find the source of the infestation?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Ты вернулась! Нашла источник заражения?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You really did it?!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: У тебя получилось?!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Where did you find it? What was it?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Где ты его нашла? Что это было?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: You see, it was below... \.\.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Видишь ли, он был под...\.\.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: It was below the Chief's house? And some strange poles that summoned the Wiccats?
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Он был под домом вождя? И какие-то непонятные столбы, которые вызывали Злокошек?

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: That really doesn't sound like something humans could do.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Это и правда не похоже на то, что люди могли бы сделать.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This is a sacred place to my people. We better not tell them that you've been there...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Это священное место для моего народа. Нам лучше не говорить им, что ты была там...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Well, all those Wiccats sure are gone suddenly...
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Ну, все эти Злокошки вдруг исчезли...

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: This is amazing. Let's quickly go to our Eldress and tell her the news!
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Это восхитительно. Давай быстрее, идём к нашей старейшине и расскажем ей эту новость!

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: If she sees the cats gone, I'm certain the Shad will calm down.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Если она увидит, что кошки пропали, я уверена, что шады успокоятся.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: She is resting in the western part of the village. There is a large tree in the middle of the lake.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Она отдыхает в западной части деревни. Там есть большое дерево посреди озера.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Come find me there.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Найди меня там.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: [кивает]

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: It looks like my input wasn't needed.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Похоже, что моя помощь не потребовалась.

maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.orig: Lea's expression says it all.
maps/jungle/clearing/clear-path-04.json/.text: Выражение лица Леи говорит обо всём.
